metadata.title: RA8: High performance Graphics MCUs package line-up for diverse applications

sections.content:
Question:
What package options are available for the RA8M1, RA8D1 and RA8T1 Group MCUs?
Answer:
The RA8M1 Group MCUs support a wide lineup of package options including 100LQFP, 144LQFP and 176LQFP with 0.5mm pitch and 224BGA with 0.8mm pitch.
The RA8D1 Group MCUs support 176LQFP package with 0.5mm pitch and 224BGA package with 0.8mm pitch.
The RA8T1 Group MCUs support a wide lineup of package options including 100LQFP, 144LQFP and 176LQFP with 0.5mm pitch and 224BGA with 0.8mm pitch.
Suitable Products
RA8M1, RA8D1, RA8T1
